name: subgraph-bean
description: A subgraph for indexing events emitted by the Bean ERC-20 token.

scripts.build: echo Using manifest at ./manifests/$1.yaml && yarn codegen && graph build ./manifests/$1.yaml
scripts.build-cache: sh -c 'for file in ./cache-builder/*.js; do node "$file"; done'
scripts.create-local: echo Using manifest at ./manifests/$1.yaml && graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ bean_$1
scripts.remove-local: echo Using manifest at ./manifests/$1.yaml && graph remove --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ bean_$1
scripts.deploy-local: echo Using manifest at ./manifests/$1.yaml && yarn codegen && graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 bean_$1 ./manifests/$1.yaml
